-- | Convenience functions and instances for Debug.Trace
--   
--   Convenience functions and instances for tracing, based on Debug.Trace.
@package DebugTraceHelpers
@version 0.12

module Debug.Trace.Helpers
traceTrue :: Show a => a -> Bool
traceIt :: Show a => a -> a
traceMsg :: Show a => [Char] -> a -> a
traceReadableMsg :: Show a => [Char] -> a -> a
dbgFile :: MonadIO m => FilePath -> String -> m ()
traceWith :: (a -> String) -> a -> a
traceM :: Monad m => String -> m ()
